Header.title: Timpetrotec
Header.paragraph: Vast experience in technical support services to the Oil and Gas sector, offers a wide range of products and services aimed at improving safety, quality and reliability in the Marine, Energy and all major industries.

About.paragraph: Over the years, we have served numerous clients ranging from Marine Companies, Oil and Gas Servicing Companies, Construction Companies, and Drilling Companies. At TIMPETROTEC LIMITED we conduct our operations through the efficient and optimal use of materials and energy with minimal waste and damage to the environment. We take HSE issues personal. All incidents can be prevented and we continuously strive for zero accidents to personnel, materials, and the environment.

Services.name: Equipment Leasing services;
Services.text: TIMPETROTEC LTD Is the largest in offshore containers, Baskets and Equipment leasing. Our leasing services range from short term, one-way trips to long term and hire purchase facilities. In addition to standard dry cargo units, our fleet of containers includes many specials – palletizes, side door units, open tops, flat racks, bulkers and ISO tanks. Non ISO containers built specifically for storage use are also provided. In many locations we can arrange delivery and collection.

Services.name: Non Destructive Testing and lifting equipment inspection services
Services.text: We offer a complete range of non-destructive testing (NDT), visual inspection and materials sampling inspection capabilities. Our technicians are qualified to international standards and are supported by the expertise of our inspection department and associated affiliates.

Services.name: Installation and Maintenance of Offshore and Onshore Equipment
Services.text: TIMPETROTEC LIMITED is an indigenous Company with a vast experience in Installation and Maintenance which covers the areas of Sewage Treatment plants, Reverse Osmosis Desalination, Oil water separation and Purification units.  We implement strategic asset management and development programmes that improve availability and efficiency and streamline our client’s overall operating economy.Aside from providing advice on strategic maintenance management, we provide installations, maintenance solutions and equipment for the offshore industry

Services.name: Rope Access Inspection Services
Services.text: We are specialist in rope access, a safe, reliable and effective technique to reach inaccessible areas. Rope access is more versatile than gondolas or cranes, more efficient than scaffolding and can eliminate unnecessary downtime. The versatility of rope access services permits flexible and comprehensive service on the inspection and structural maintenance programs. Since, rope systems are unobtrusive, it benefits clients who wish to retain the visual integrity of the structure during inspection or maintenance works.

Services.name: Onshore and Offshore labour supply
Services.text: We supply Onshore and Offshore labor to compliment the services we offer on a standalone basis. We are able to supply multi skilled labor worldwide and specialize in fast turnaround (24 hours or less) and are able to source and mobilize labor, from a single person to a complete crew ready for work for either long or short term contracts. With our experienced and qualified certification, hard working, skilled and professional manpower on hand in fabrication and construction field or drilling crews, you can be confident that our manpower on hand will make your work successful and on time.
